If you have salt and iron filings, .
If not, read on.

The ghoul arrives at midnight but is undeterred by the benediction you spoke over the girl’s body. It climbs in through an open window and lopes on long thin legs over to the trestle where the body lies. You are watching from behind a door, and when you see the ghoul begin its grisly meal you know it is time to decide: will you step out and confront it, or slip away into the night?
